input: Requests by myuser to perform all S3 actions on objects in the prod--testfiles bucket should be allowed. Requests by any user except root and myuser to put objects in the prod--testfiles bucket should be denied.
dsl:
1. ALLOW user:myuser ACTION:s3:* ON bucket:prod--testfiles/*  
2. DENY user:* ACTION:s3:PutObject ON bucket:prod--testfiles/* WHERE NOT user:root AND NOT user:myuser
